forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. West wind 15 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. Northwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. North wind 3 to 8 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
